changeSet.author: Yash

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from location where name = 'Chipinge Clinic'

changeSet.comment: Mapping Identifier source name to Chipinge Location
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location_attribute (location_id,attribute_type_id,value_reference,uuid,creator,date_created,changed_by,date_changed,voided,voided_by,date_voided,void_reason) VALUES ((select location_id from location where name = 'Chipinge Clinic'),1,(select name from idgen_identifier_source where name = 'CHPA1' and retired = 0),uuid(),1,now(),NULL,NULL,0,NULL,NULL,NULL);

changeSet.author: Yash
Yash
changeSet.comment: Mapping Identifier source name to Location
